alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Orange; Washington; Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 17 at 3:30PM EST until December 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM SATURDAY TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central, northeast and southern Vermont. * WHEN...From 1 PM Saturday to 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop across the region from south to north beginning mid-day Saturday and may become briefly heavy at times into the early overnight hours before ending around sunrise Sunday. Some localized pockets of light freezing drizzle are possible early Sunday morning, which could make surfaces slick.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Caledonia; Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Orange; Washington; Windsor
